title: Crash Puts Green Jersey in Danger for Biniam Girmay at Tour de France: ‘He Doesn’t Deserve To Lose It Like This’
content:
The race for the 'maillot vert' is heating up unexpectedly after the worst possible outcome for Girmay in Tuesday's final sprint stage: 'I don't care if I lose this jersey or if I keep it.'

Read the full article at Crash Puts Green Jersey in Danger for Biniam Girmay at Tour de France: ‘He Doesn’t Deserve To Lose It Like This’ on Velo.
author: ahood
